website_summaries.verdict: Locks your foundation into place and gives your face a subtle, dewy glow.
pros: Smooths skin and adds a subtle sheen
A winner for those with dryer skin
Lightweight and keeps foundation in place
Lightly tinted formula that blends in easily
A little goes a long way
cons: Consistency was too thin for some
May not work well with oily skin

customer_reviews.title: This is not the same product that you buy in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same product that you buy in the Bare Minerals store. It's thin/watery and doesn't give the same brightening effect. It was either WAY past it's expiration date or It's not the product that the bottle says it is. :*
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I've used the primer purchased from Bare Minerals store and liked it. This stuff is crap and did not perform as it should. Also it is tinted which I missed before I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gruen

customer_reviews.title: HG PRIMER + USE DAILY
customer_reviews.text: Holy Grail Primer! Works great alone or with bb cream primer/drop foundation as tinted moisturizer! Adds a subtle sheen to your skin alone or makes an excellent tinted moisturizer when mixed. I've used it daily for over 5 years. I receive many complements on my skin. This product, when used with the BareMineral foundation does not cause breakouts, even after guilty nights when I don't take the time to wash my face.
customer_reviews.author: Clever_Witmaker

customer_reviews.title: The main thing about buying this product over and over again is that AMAZON is the Best way to go...Their Delivery is TOPS1
customer_reviews.text: I love Bare Minerals because a litte goes a long way. As they say less is more... But most of all I love Bare Minerals because their product like this Prime fits everyone....One fits all. No second guessing... That is what I love about Bare Minerals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I use it to make it easier to apply concealer.
customer_reviews.author: nova

customer_reviews.title: Good quality primer
customer_reviews.text: Love this prime. Some primers I used irritates my skin but not this one. It works really well!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca P

customer_reviews.title: Good base for any type of foundation makeup
customer_reviews.text: Adds right amount of softening and smoothing base for foundations
customer_reviews.author: Gdevita

customer_reviews.title: Smooth as silk
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the summer I wear it in place of foundation. It gives a soft illuminating effect. Goes on like silk. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Baker

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Just gives my skin a smooth, soft velvety feel. The scent is very little and is very pleasing. Thank you bareMinerals!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Dewy, Silky Skin
customer_reviews.text: Goes on silky smooth, the tint disappears into my skin and helps my makeup last all day. Has a glow to it, so it helps make skin look dewy.
customer_reviews.author: JAW

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like Bare Minerals products and this is no exception
customer_reviews.author: NHlaxMOM

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily! It’s a little oily. But wears great!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Enhances face
customer_reviews.text: Enhances face color. Stays on for hours. Doesn't feel heavy on face. Nice product , will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Don Cribb

customer_reviews.title: Best primer ever
customer_reviews.text: This primer is amazing. It makes my foundation stay on all day. My face looks so hydrated and radiant with the primer and foundation together.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Helps make a smooth surface to apply make up to and help keep it on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love bare minerals!!! Used to has Rosacea break outs but No more since using bare minerals products.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sundell

customer_reviews.title: Creates smooth, even foundation
customer_reviews.text: Light, moisturizing and re-finishing layer that can be used alone or under bare minerals powders
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What I received did not seem to be new.
customer_reviews.text: What I received seemed to have been used and not new.
customer_reviews.author: Anne F. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great Foundation Primer
customer_reviews.text: Using a primer for my foundation has been a necessity since it makes the application smooth. You can even just us the primer on its own since it has a slight tint. This brand has never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Carol, AZ

customer_reviews.title: My go to primer always
customer_reviews.text: Very light to use and slightly tinted. You don’t need to use much. It makes me skin feel so soft. Love it with or without makeup. Have been using this for years.
customer_reviews.author: My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Yup!
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to this stuff. Makes my skin look hydrated and holds makeup well!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Lady

customer_reviews.title: Too runny
customer_reviews.text: It seemed watered down. The one that has SPF is creamy, this one is runny. It's not covering my pores.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Silky skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Made my face feel so smooth and silky. Slight tint so can wear alone or under face makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Gm

product_meta.title: bareMinerals Prime Time Brightening Foundation Primer for Face, 1 Ounce
product_meta.description: It is a breakthrough primer that adds an extraordinarily luminous, healthy-looking glow to your skin while smoothing out your complexion. It glides on with no tacky feel and is suitable for all skin types.
feature_bullets: Combats rough patches, flaky dryness, fine lines, excess oil, uneven texture and enlarged pores so that your foundation goes on flawlessly
Extends the wear of your foundation, keeping you looking fresh for longer
Soothes and nourishes with plant extracts, antioxidants and Vitamins C and E
The package dimension of the product is 9"L x 6"W x 3"H
